title: Beware of the Villainess! - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Confident Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Cute Story   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Magic Beasts   Maids   Master-Servant Relationship   Nobles   Royalty   Slow Romance   Sword And Magic   Tomboyish Female Lead   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 뽕따맛스크류바
description:
I transmigrated as the villainess of a novel. 

So what if I’m a villainess? As the daughter of a Duke, I am rich and unemployed! I’ll simply live a leisurely life… or at least, that was what I thought until I witnessed my fiancé, the Crown Prince, having an affair right in front of me. 

I used to shed tears when I saw him laugh with another woman in his arms, but now, I did not reveal my emotions.

Instead, I asked him a question with a bright and happy expression on my face, “Are you a son of a b*tch?”

She was dropped in the world of a novel and planned on overthrowing the original novel’s plot!>
